@everyone 🎉 **SOLISCADA Labour Day Notice** 🎉

@everyone Please note: **May 1 → May 5** is a national holiday in our region, so our SOLISCADA support team will be offline during those dates (all times are Singapore Time, UTC+8).

If you run into any issues, you can still:

1. Leave a message here in Discord  
2. Email us at **soliscada@supcon.com** (⚠️ please whitelist us!)

We’ll be back at our desks on **May 6 (Wednesday)** and will respond as soon as possible.

Thank you for your understanding—enjoy your week! 🛠️✨
